name: Legend of the Moon
description:
-Retro dungeon exploring action RPG

-For those who get sick and tired of endless and meaningless level up
we developed it so they can get nostalgic about the moment you held a controller to see the ending part when young.

-English-Japanese-Korean Language support

-There is no in-app payment system.

-Of course, we do not ask in-app payment.

-Data is not consumed during play.

-Saved data is stored in your phone. When you delete the game, it is deleted together.

-If you use ‘Stab’ attack in [Game Tip] well, it will make you run the game more smoothly.
